Broad arrowheads are made into broad arrows when used with headless arrows, requiring 52 Fletching and broader fletching to be unlocked with Slayer reward points from slayer masters, yielding 150 experience per 15 arrows.

Broad arrows are used in Slayer to kill Kurasks and Turoths. They are more powerful than mithril arrows and slightly less powerful than adamant arrows, but are untradeable.

They are purchased for 55 at all slayer equipment shops from any slayer master. They can also be purchased in bulk as broad arrowhead packs.

[[File:Broad arrowheads detail.png|left|130x200px]]
'''Broad arrowheads''' are made into [[broad arrow]]s when used with [[headless arrow]]s, requiring 52 [[Fletching]] and ''broader fletching'' to be unlocked with [[Slayer reward point]]s from [[slayer master]]s, yielding 150 experience per 15 arrows. 

Broad arrows are used in [[Slayer]] to kill [[Kurask]]s and [[Turoth]]s. They are more powerful than [[mithril arrow]]s and slightly less powerful than [[adamant arrow]]s, but are untradeable.

They are purchased for {{Coins|55}} at all [[slayer equipment]] shops from any slayer master. They can also be purchased in bulk as [[broad arrowhead pack]]s.
